thread.section_title: Le Relais du Louvre - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: location is what matters
thread.title_full: location is what matters - Review of Le Relais du Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: judy e
title: location is what matters
text:
Wonderful location for museums seeing the Seine. Small hotel in old building, nice decor, homely.
the single room was a problem: the bathroom is unsafe in its layout, the heating was erratic. staff were helpful
Room Tip: be warned that in the single room the shower is practically on top of the toilet See more room tips
